name: versioncounter
description: Build and release task for a version number counter
author: Maik van der Gaag

inputs.name: VersionVariable
inputs.label: The saved version variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the saved variable. The value should be in the format '1.6.3'.

inputs.name: UpdateMinorVersion
inputs.label: Automatically update minor number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Automatically update the minor version number when the maximum value of the patch number is reached.

inputs.name: MaxValuePatchVersion
inputs.label: Maximum value of the patch number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The maximum value to the path number

inputs.name: UpdateMajorVersion
inputs.label: Automatically update major number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Automatically update the major version number when the maximum value of the patch number is reached.

inputs.name: MaxValueMinorVersion
inputs.label: Maximum value of the minor number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The maximum value to the minor number

inputs.name: OnlyUpdateMinor
inputs.label: Update Minor version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Only update the Minor. The rest will go as configured.

inputs.name: UseSystemAccessToken
inputs.label: Use system OAuth token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Make use of the system OAuth token to authenticate, leaving this false will use the DevOps Pat specified.

inputs.name: DevOpsPat
inputs.label: Azure DevOps Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The personal access token for Azure DevOps

inputs.name: buildapiversion
inputs.label: API Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the API Version that will be used for the build APIs.
